ui.end-concentration-dialog-content: You are concentrating on {originName}. Are you sure you want to cast another concentration spell to replace it?
ui.declare-roll-as-damage-targeted: Declare as damage to targeted tokens
ui.declare-roll-as-damage-selected: Declare as damage to selected tokens
ui.confirm-no-targets-content: You did not select any targets. Do you want to continue?

item.condition-creature-enters-area: A creature first enters the area on a turn
item.condition-creature-starts-turn-inside-ar: A creature starts its turn inside the area
item.condition-creature-ends-turn-inside-area: A creature ends its turn inside the area
item.condition-creature-moves-within-area: A creature moves within the area
item.condition-ally-enters-area: An ally first enters the area on its turn
item.condition-ally-starts-turn-inside-area: An ally starts its turn inside the area
item.condition-ally-ends-turn-inside-area: An ally ends its turn inside the area
item.condition-ally-moves-within-area: An ally moves within the area
item.condition-enemy-enters-area: An enemy first enters the area on its turn
item.condition-enemy-starts-turn-inside-area: An enemy starts its turn inside the area
item.condition-enemy-ends-turn-inside-area: An enemy ends its turn inside the area
item.condition-enemy-moves-within-area: An enemy moves within the area
item.condition-area-reveals-creature: A creature is revealed from the area
item.condition-area-reveals-ally: An ally is revealed from the area
item.condition-area-reveals-enemy: An enemy is revealed from the area
item.condition-target-hits.mwak: Hits with a melee weapon attack
item.condition-target-hits.rwak: Hits with a ranged weapon attack
item.condition-target-hits.msak: Hits with a melee spell attack
item.condition-target-hits.rsak: Hits with a ranged spell attack
item.condition-target-is-attacked.mwak: Targeted by a melee weapon attack
item.condition-target-is-attacked.rwak: Targeted by a ranged weapon attack
item.condition-target-is-attacked.msak: Targeted by a melee spell attack
item.condition-target-is-attacked.rsak: Targeted by a ranged spell attack
item.condition-target-is-hit.mwak: Is hit by a melee weapon attack
item.condition-target-is-hit.rwak: Is hit by a ranged weapon attack
item.condition-target-is-hit.msak: Is hit by a melee spell attack
item.condition-target-is-hit.rsak: Is hit by a ranged spell attack
item.update-apply-overtime: Activate over time damage and effects
item.update-end-on-save: End the effect on a save
item.update-end-on-check: End the effect on an ability check

active-effect.apply-on-save-or-miss: Apply the effect if the save succeeds or the attack misses
active-effect.blocks-area-conditions-hint: While this effect is active on an actor, area based conditions on the item itself will not trigger for this actor.
active-effect.application-phase-hint: The conditions for the activation are determined in the effect application section below and on the main item sheet
active-effect.track-independent-duration: Track duration independently from concentration or master effect
active-effect.track-independent-duration-hint: With this enabled, this effect will stay running until the end of its duration even if the caster drops the effect.
active-effect.aura-targets: Apply this effect as an aura
active-effect.aura-targets-hint: The radius of the aura is taken from the target row of the main item, which should be a radius in feet

configure-check.fast-forward-hint: Shift-click or right-click the item to skip this dialog

warn.select-single-target-for-attack: Select a target for the attack
warn.damage-roll-has-no-parts: There is no damage to roll!

settings.wounded-threshold: HP percentage to apply "Wounded" condition to NPCs
settings.wounded-threshold-hint: (Convenient Effects required) When an NPC's hit points fall to below or equal to this percent of maximum hit points, The "Wounded" condition is applied. If a "Damaged" condition is available, it is applied whenever an NPC takes any damage at all.
settings.reveal-npc-turn-change: Reveal NPC turn change notifications to players
settings.reveal-npc-turn-change-hint: NPC combatants who are hidden in the combat tracker will not be shown even if this setting is enabled.
settings.reveal-save-dc-hint: Players will always see DCs for player abilities. This will reveal DCs for NPC abilities when saves are required from PCs.
settings.hide-npc-save-results-hint: Without this option, players will see if NPCs targeted by their spells/abilities fail or succeed saves. Select this to hide the result.
settings.damage-roll-confirms-hit-hint: If selected, whenever the GM is prompted to choose if an NPC attack roll was a hit, the damage buttons will also be shown. Pressing a damage button will then automatically call the attack roll a hit before rolling damage.
settings.change-turn-focus-npc: When an NPC's turn starts, focus on the token
settings.change-turn-control-npc: When an NPC's turn starts, select the token
settings.auto-drop-concentration-hint: If this is not selected, a card will be displayed prompting to drop concentration.

keybindings.confirm-attack-hit-hint: Confirms the latest attack that needs an attack roll confirmation as ahit
keybindings.confirm-attack-miss-hint: Confirms the latest attack that needs an attack roll confirmation as a miss
keybindings.confirm-attack-auto: Confirm attack to use calculated result
keybindings.confirm-attack-auto-hint: Confirms the latest attack that needs an attack roll confirmation to either hit or miss based on a comparison with the target AC

actor-upgrade.title: WIRE Item Upgrade: {actorName}
actor-upgrade.upgradeable-hint: These items have been previously imported from a WIRE compatible compendium.
actor-upgrade.replaceable-hint: These items have not been imported from a WIRE compatible compendium, but an item with a matching name was found in currently active compendiums.
actor-upgrade.modification-warning: This tool can not detect any modifications done to imported items after the import. Upgrading will lose any customization.

beta-warning.title: WIRE is in beta
beta-warning.content:
This is a large and ambitious module and it has only seen a very limited amount of testing among a wider public. There will be bugs, potentially game stopping ones. Please keep this in mind as you try it out.

I appreciate any interest in using the module and good bug reports in the module repository issue tracker can help get issues fixed for all the interested users.

As this is a complex module, reading the documentation on github (both the README and the wiki) is strongly recommended. Missing or unclear documentation can also be reported on the issue tracker.

I want to specifically mention that any unforeseen problems following public release might require changes that are not compatible with some items set up to work with WIRE and future updates might require you to redo some of the customization you've done already. I will try to keep this to a minimum and apologize in advance for any inconvenience this might cause.

Thank you for checking WIRE out. Clicking Yes below will hide this message in the future.

module-check.itemacro-content:
The following Item Macro settings should be off for WIRE and Item Macro to work correctly together.

  • Character Sheet Hook
  • Override default macro execution

At least one of them is currently enabled. Do you want to use the recommended settings?
